description.displayText:
We had the pleasure of Jenny as a full time nanny for our daughter's baby and toddler years until we made the tough decision to move away from NYC. She was flexible and supportive of our schedule, often stepping in with little notice to cover unexpected engagements. 

Jenny has consistently been professional, prompt and communicative, & is a pleasure to be around. She formed a special relationship with our daughter, who has grown to adore and trust her. Our daughter has been comfortable with Jenny through teething, illnesses, late nights and sleep trouble. She was proactive with housekeeping duties and kept all baby gear organized and in good condition. 

She leveraged her connections with other local carers to suggest activities to suit our daughter and constructed a weekly schedule with a good balance of social interaction and developmentally appropriate learning opportunities. 

We highly highly recommend Jenny for any family, and would happily rehire her if we ever came back to NYC

description.displayText:
Jenny was our girl's full time nanny from infant days (for my return to work) through to the toddler years. She quickly became an indispensable part of our family and formed a strong bond with our girl. We always found Jenny to be patient, kind, reliable, intuitive & knowledgeable. 

Jenny used her years of experience to give timely advice for current + upcoming developmental stages. She guided our family through many hurdles and was the driving force behind our girl's success with milestones such as crawling, walking, sleeping, eating solids & social interactions. Jenny was able to offer gentle advice that never felt pushy and was completely supportive of any particular approach we wanted to implement. She was responsive & supportive of our daughter at all times, knowing when to encourage & when to soothe including through all the rough teething and illness times. 

We cannot recommend Jenny highly enough - she has been a beloved part of our family, one our daughter will never forget.

description.displayText: Jenny is an absolutely wonderful nanny. I was a stay at home mom and Jenny was the nanny to my friend's kids. I watched Jenny interact with those kids on many different occasions and I can say with full confidence Jenny was the reason the kids were reading and writing ahead of their class as well as being so well adjusted. Jenny always helped around the house too. No job was too big or small, and she truly loves her job. She is an invaluable asset to any family looking to welcome a helping hand for their household.

description.displayText: Jenny was my son's nanny from when he was 3 months to 4 years old. In that time, Jenny became a part of our family, and we still stay in touch to this day! Jenny is very responsible, reliable, smart, kind, and helpful. She would teach my son his alphabet and numbers, and when he went to pre-k, he was well prepared. Whenever anyone asks how my son became such a kind, smart, courteous person, I always tell them it was because of Jenny. Jenny is one of a kind and whoever hires her will be very lucky!

description.displayText: Jenny is a lovely, caring, reliable lady who took excellent care of our son for almost three years. She was joyful, positive and hardworking. We would definitely recommend her.
